sense.def:
A screen
je ravna navpična ploskev televizijskega sprejemnika ali računalniškega monitorja ter velika ploskev v kinematografu, na kateri se prikazujejo slike ali besede.

seg.quote: A picture would flash onto the screen.

sense.def:
Izraz
the screen
včasih uporabljamo tudi za filme, ki jih predvajajo v kinematografih.

seg.quote: ...Greta Garbo and other stars of the screen.

sense.def:
To screen a film or a television programme
pomeni pokazati film v kinematografu ali oddajo na televiziji.

seg.quote: They tried to prevent the programme being screened.
There was an attempt to stop the screening.

sense.def:
A screen
je tudi navpična plošča, s katero ločimo dele prostora ali del prostora zavarujemo pred mrzlim zrakom.

seg.quote: He got up and walked behind the screen.

sense.def:
To screen someone
pomeni stopiti pred nekoga ali nekaj postaviti pred nekoga, da ga drugi ne bi videli ali poškodovali.

seg.quote: I moved in front of her trying to screen her.

sense.def:
Kadar organizacija
screens people
, s preiskovanjem ugotavlja, ali ljudje morda niso nevarni ali nepošteni.

seg.quote: The Secret Service screens several hundred people every week.

sense.def:
To screen people for a disease
pomeni pregledati ljudi, da se prepričamo, ali nimajo določene bolezni.

seg.quote: ...a study of women who were screened for breast cancer.
...a screening at a London medical centre.

sense.def:
To screen off part of a room
pomeni postaviti zaslon, s katerim del sobe ločimo od drugega prostora.
